body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, confectioner. Kentucky native. Married to Emeline Hite Ellis in Nelson County on August 13, 1840. Father of Thomas Ellis, A. E. Ellis, Benjamin Ellis, J. Ellis, Emma Ellis, Susan Ellis, Isabell Ellis, and Owen Ellis. Clerk in Nelson County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Confectioner in Nelson County in 1860.
